name: InitializePaymentType
auth_description: Requires a user of type `Employee` or `Api`

headers.name: EVA-User-Agent
headers.description: The user agent that is making these calls. Don't make this specific per device/browser but per application. This should be of the form: `MyFirstUserAgent/1.0.0`

headers.name: EVA-Requested-OrganizationUnitID
headers.description: The ID of the organization unit to run this request in.

headers.name: EVA-Requested-OrganizationUnit-Query
headers.description: The query that selects the organization unit to run this request in.

headers.name: EVA-IDs-Mode
headers.description: The IDs mode to run this request in. Currently only `ExternalIDs` is supported.

F.name: DateTimeValue
F.description: Used for datatype DateTime and Date

F.name: NumberValue
F.description: Used for datatype Integer and Decimal

F.name: StringValue
F.description: Used for datatype String, Text and Enum

E.name: Values
E.description: This is the ID of a `CustomField`

T.name: ArticleVatcategory
T.description:
Possible values:

* `1` - HighRate
* `2` - LowRate
* `3` - ZeroRate
* `4` - NullRate
* `5` - MiddleRate

S.name: CustomerGender
S.description:
Possible values:

* `0` - Unknown
* `1` - Male
* `2` - Female
* `9` - NotApplicable

U.name: UserCardID
U.description: This is the ID of a `UserCard`

Z.name: DisplayOnTerminal
Z.description: If the current station terminal should be instructed to show this QR code, too.

Z.name: ReturnUrl
Z.description: ReturnUrl where the customer should be redirected to after the payment.

Z.name: SendEmail
Z.description: If an email with payment information should be sent.

Z.name: SendEmailTo
Z.description: When `SendEmail` is true, but `SendEmailTo` is omitted, a fallback to the Order.Customer.EmailAddress is attempted.

BB.name: StationID
BB.description: This is the ID of a `Station`

B.name: PaymentTypeID
B.description: This is the ID of a `PaymentType`

BM.name: Code
BM.description: A unique ID identifying this error.

BM.name: Message
BM.description: A human-readable message describing the error.

BM.name: RequestID
BM.description: A unique ID identifying the request. Please provide this ID when contacting support.

BM.name: Type
BM.description: A short description of the error type.

BN.name: ExternalIDs
BN.description: When using the `ExternalIDs` mode, this will hold the resolved external IDs.

BN.name: IsAsyncResultAvailable
BN.description: This is a flag indicating whether the async request is done. If it is `null`, it is not an async service. If it is `false`, the response is not yet available. Do not process the properties in that case. It is is `true` the properties are filled with the result of the call.

BN.name: UnresolvedExternalIDs
BN.description: When using the `ExternalIDs` mode, this will hold the external IDs we couldn't resolve.

BS.name: OrderID
BS.description: This is the ID of a `Order`
